con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-DATQIT
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests negativ test scenarios described in user story: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2693 - Download QIT-File, DAT-File with file name in QIT-File is unknown. (is implemented in good-case above) - Download and Upload DAT-File without QIT-File. - Download and Upload DAT-File, QIT-Files with Errors.
2020-03-05 - MG: Additional one dat-file and one qit-file with wrong not pasable content will be created and loaded. Jobs must rename wrong files to filename.failed, return filename and continue process.

con:config.con:query: SELECT DAT_FILENAME, PROCESSING_STATUS, DAT_DOWNLOAD_DATE, DAT_UPLOAD_DATE, QIT_FILENAME, QIT_STATUS, QIT_ERROR_CODE, QIT_DOWNLOAD_DATE, QIT_UPLOAD_DATE FROM POS_TOPUP_ACCOUNTING WHERE POS_TOPUP_ACCOUNTING.ID>${#TestCase#maxID} ORDER BY DAT_FILENAME ASC
SELECT t.parameters, t.status FROM TASK t WHERE t.id > '${#TestCase#maxID_Email}' AND t.TASK_TYPE_ID = 9 ORDER BY t.id DESC

con:configuration.content: *<content>DAT-File ${#TestCase#DATFile_NoQIT} was delivered at*to*. No QIT-File is delivered after 0 days*
